summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented in code (shared logo path + header/footer fallback handling; kW-to-image mapping + calculator integration). However, the diff does not show the required static image assets being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, nor does it provide evidence that the actual logo artwork file was replaced. The diff also includes multiple unrelated page/route/content changes not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required static image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and wire them into the UI (do not serve generated images via the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows code referencing `/assets/generated/solar-kw-*.png` but does not show the actual image files being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the website logo with the user-uploaded logo so that the header and footer display the new logo consistently (including mobile header), without showing the fallback 'GKV' text logo unless the image fails to load.
missing_requirements.reason: Code continues to reference the same logo path and adds fallback behavior, but the diff does not include any evidence that the static logo asset (`frontend/public/assets/generated/gkv-logo.dim_512x512.png`) artwork itself was replaced as required.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new dynamic service detail route `/services/$serviceSlug` and related routing changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest, which is limited to logo replacement and kW-matched calculator imagery.

hallucinated_features.description: Substantial new/updated content across multiple pages (e.g., About page board of directors, expanded Subsidies page, HowItWorks page infographic content, Projects/Contact updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; scope is limited to branding logo asset replacement and calculator kW image behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced new shared brand constants including a tagline and brand name centralization.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested; the request only requires the logo artwork replacement while keeping the same logo path and consistent rendering.
